name: Calculator
synopsis: Calculator handles 135 measurement units and constants of most types which ordinary people use every day, including length, weight, temperature, speed, volume, area, and time. Features: - The basic and scientific calculators - Calculate with degrees or radians - Supports decimal, hexadecimal, octal, binary numbers - Percent button will behave just like on a basic calculator - Memory buttons will also behave just like on a basic calculator - Database of 135 most popular units and physical constants - Reverse direction of any conversion - You punch in digits and Calculator does the conversion on the fly
